articles.title: Haggerty: Playoff format might not help Bruins, but does it really matter? - NBCSports.com
articles.description: The encouraging news is the headline here. Let’s make no mistake about it. The NHL became the first major professional sports league to announce an official format to return to play in North America from the COVID-19 crisis with a 24-team tournament.
